name: Right To Bear Arms - 2D Shooter
description:
These are the modification I made for my 2D Shooter

  • Added Fish (Fire Rate Powerup) (Introduced in Level 3)
  • Added Water (interactable)
  • Modified Camera
  • 5 Playable Levels

Original Sprites Created

  • Bear (Original)
  • Beehive (Original)
  • Paper (Original)
  • Water (Original)
  • Hunter (Original)
  • Fish (Original)

Credits:

Font (PurpleSmile)

  • Tree (https://www.deviantart.com/clawsthecat/art/RPG-Tree-Sprite-Day-304273153)
  • Grass (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9TlmBmMonIc&ab_channel=HeartBeast)
  • Forrest (http://spritefx.blogspot.com/2013/07/sprite-background-plants.html)

Created by Jack Rockwood
